A Song<S>7892</S> of degrees<S>4609</S>. Blessed<S>835</S> is every one that feareth<S>3373</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; that walketh<S>1980</S> in his ways<S>1870</S>.
For thou shalt eat<S>398</S> the labour<S>3018</S> of thine hands<S>3709</S>: happy<S>835</S> shalt thou be, and it shall be well<S>2896</S> with thee.
Thy wife<S>802</S> shall be as a fruitful<S>6509</S> vine<S>1612</S> by the sides<S>3411</S> of thine house<S>1004</S>: thy children<S>1121</S> like olive<S>2132</S> plants<S>8363</S> round about<S>5439</S> thy table<S>7979</S>.
Behold, that thus shall the man<S>1397</S> be blessed<S>1288</S> that feareth<S>3373</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> shall bless<S>1288</S> thee out of Zion<S>6726</S>: and thou shalt see<S>7200</S> the good<S>2898</S> of Jerusalem<S>3389</S> all the days<S>3117</S> of thy life<S>2416</S>.
Yea, thou shalt see<S>7200</S> thy children's<S>1121</S> children<S>1121</S>, and peace<S>7965</S> upon Israel<S>3478</S>.
